Firstly, there is a limitation to be aware of: if a currency is already supported in the Verus Desktop, such as Bitcoin (BTC) or Ethereum (ETH), you will not be able to use those same currency names for your PBaaS chain. This limitation is currently an errata, but it will be resolved before the mainnet release.
